title: Project One — Parking Ticket App
body_html:
Parking Ticket App

A full-stack web application for managing city parking violations.

Features

  • Create and manage tickets
  • Upload evidence images
  • Admin dashboard

Tech stack: Node.js, Express, PostgreSQL
